name: Wiki.js
description: An open source, modern and powerful wiki app built on Node.js, Git and Markdown.

WIKI_HOST.description: Full URL of your Wiki app

WIKI_LANG.description: UI Language (en, es, fr, ko, ru, zh)

WIKI_IS_PUBLIC.description: Is the wiki publicly accessible? (without login)

WIKI_GIT_URL.description: URL of the remote git repository

WIKI_GIT_BRANCH.description: Branch of the remote git repository to use. This branch must already exist.

WIKI_GIT_USERNAME.description: Username to access the remote git repository

WIKI_GIT_PASSWORD.description: Password / PAT / Deploy Key to access the remote git repository

WIKI_SERVER_EMAIL.description: Default email to use as commit author

WIKI_SHOW_USER_EMAIL.description: Whether to use user email as author in commits

WIKI_ADMIN_EMAIL.description: Email to use during root administrator account creation (default password: admin123)

WIKI_SESSION_KEY.description: A long and unique random string used to encrypt sessions
